text:
this is actually really black box magic-y:
```julia> ^(2, -3)
0.125

julia> @which ^(2, -3)
^(x::T, p::T) where T<:Integer in Base at intfuncs.jl:273

julia> @enter ^(2, -3)
[ Info: tracking Base
In ^(x, p) at intfuncs.jl:273

1|debug>
In power_by_squaring(x_, p) at intfuncs.jl:238
 245      return x*x
 246  elseif p < 0
 247      isone(x) && return copy(x)
 248      isone(-x) && return iseven(p) ? one(x) : copy(x)
>249      throw_domerr_powbysq(x, p)
 250  end
 251  t = trailing_zeros(p) + 1
 252  p >>= t
 253  while (t -= 1) > 0

About to run: (Base.throw_domerr_powbysq)(2, -3)
1|debug>
ERROR: DomainError with -3:
Cannot raise an integer x to a negative power -3.```
